strings.evolution:
Not only have I grown more charming,
but I've even obtained new strength.
I guess it's because I'm so darn hot!
strings.description: A man who befriended Rain and his companions whilst opposing the oppressive Zoldaad Empire. Jake always defends the little people and stands by what is righteous, condemning the powerful who prey upon the weak. He never fails to defend any ladies in his presence, and treats Rain and Lasswell as if they were his own children. Occasionally, he will also impart some words of wisdom befitting his age.
strings.fusion:
So this is the power to protect.
Though I'm sure if I misuse it,
someone will get burned.

strings.evolution:
To be able to grow even at this age
must mean I still have potential.
I'll be even more charming now.
strings.description: The man leading the people of the rebel army fighting against the oppressive Zoldaad Empire. Jake is a well seasoned warrior who used Rain and his companions to his own ends, albeit without any malice behind his motives. Always seeking to aid the defenseless, he is rarely apologetic about the soft spot he has developed for the ladies.
strings.fusion:
Okay, okay.
I'm stronger, just how you wanted.

strings.description: The leader of the rebel army opposing the Zoldaad Empire. A lighthearted man by nature, Jake is even more easily swayed by women than Rain. However, he hides a fierce resolution within to protect those who suffer from oppression. When Jake first met Rain and his comrades, he made use of his sly and cunning to manipulate them into doing his bidding. These resourceful qualities, among others, are what make him such an efficient leader.
strings.fusion:
Look how manly I've become!
Try not to fall in love with me, now.
